How to use the github, how to build a website

  • Create your account on Github .
  • Host your site directly from your GitHub repository. Just edit, push, and your changes are live. .
  • Transform your plain text into static websites and blogs: Jekyll .
  • Safe, customer-facing template language for flexible web apps: Liquid .
  • A one-size-fits-all Jekyll theme for writers: Minima .
  • The easy-to-use markup language you can use to format virtually any document: Markdown .
  • The comprehensive Markdown reference guide, in book format from: Matt Cone .
  • The markdown elements are outlined in this design document: Basic syntax .
  • Web developer how to: W3school .
  • B6sics help for markdown: MyTemplate .
